5D4E7D6A.Line1.CDDE3: Ah. That madman Nafain lives out there. We already tried checking on him.

5E9B365C.Line21.CDDE3: I’m already short on knights. Not going to risk what I have left on some bastard who hates the Cathedral.

7259617B.Line11.CDDE3: There’s a horned woman in the Moors, spreading corruption, if that’s what you mean.

A642547F.Line15.CDDE3: Got as far as the Boglann Stone Circle, and then the druid’s wolf companion appeared and bit one of my men!

AED16229.VoiceDir21.CDDE3: Fed up with the situation. A small group of knights up against big scary things

B2324D17.Line23.BAE4: Yes. She’s after the druids who vanquished Astaroth.

CC57E397.VoiceDir1.CDDE3: Understanding--the knight realizes what the Player is referring to. Nafain, the local druid, is one of the people who helped defeat Astaroth in years past.

FB3FFC35.MenuLabel: “Have you seen a demon pass through here?”
